helium.name: Helium
helium.option.entity_culling.tooltip: Skip rendering entities beyond a set distance. Boosts FPS in crowded areas.
helium.option.entity_cull_distance.toolt: Max distance (blocks) to render entities. Lower = more FPS.
helium.option.block_entity_culling.toolt: Skip rendering distant block entities (chests, signs, etc). Big FPS boost.
helium.option.block_entity_cull_distance: Max distance (blocks) to render block entities. Lower = more FPS.
helium.option.particle_culling.tooltip: Skip distant particles. Improves FPS in particle-heavy scenes.
helium.option.particle_cull_distance.too: Max distance (blocks) to render particles. Lower = more FPS.
helium.option.particle_limiting.tooltip: Limit total particle count to prevent lag spikes in particle-heavy scenes.
helium.option.max_particles.tooltip: Maximum number of particles to render at once. Lower = more FPS in explosions.
helium.option.particle_priority.tooltip: When limiting, keep important particles (damage, crits) over ambient ones.
helium.option.particle_batching.tooltip: Batch similar particles for more efficient rendering.
helium.option.animation_throttling.toolt: Reduce texture animation updates for off-screen or distant blocks. Saves GPU time.
helium.option.fast_math.tooltip: Replace sin/cos/atan2 with faster approximations. Tiny accuracy loss, noticeable FPS gain.
helium.option.gl_state_cache.tooltip: Cache OpenGL state to skip redundant calls. Auto-disabled with ImmediatelyFast.
helium.option.gl_state_cache.tooltip.and: Disabled on Android. GL State Cache is not compatible with OpenGL ES.
helium.option.model_cache.tooltip: Cache baked block models in memory with LRU eviction. Reduces repeated model lookups.
helium.option.model_cache_size.tooltip: Maximum memory for cached block models. Higher = fewer cache misses, more RAM.
helium.option.memory_optimizations.toolt: Reduce garbage collection pauses by reusing objects and buffers.
helium.option.thread_optimizations.toolt: Prioritize render thread and optimize event polling for smoother frames.
helium.option.fast_startup.tooltip: Parallel class loading for faster game launch. No effect after startup.
helium.option.reduced_allocations.toolti: Pool Vec3d, Matrix4f, and other hot objects to reduce garbage collection pressure.
helium.option.auto_pause_on_idle.tooltip: Drop to low FPS after no mouse/keyboard activity. Saves power and reduces heat.
helium.option.idle_timeout.tooltip: Seconds of no activity before entering idle mode.
helium.option.idle_fps_limit.tooltip: FPS cap when idle. Lower = less power usage.
helium.option.network_optimizations.tool: Background resource processing for smoother network handling.
helium.option.fast_server_ping.tooltip: Ping all servers simultaneously instead of one by one. Much faster server list loading.
helium.option.preserve_scroll.tooltip: Don't reset the server list scroll position when you press refresh.
helium.option.fps_overlay.tooltip: Master toggle for the on-screen overlay.
helium.option.overlay_transparency.toolt: Background transparency of the overlay. 0 = fully transparent, 100 = opaque.
helium.option.show_fps_stats.tooltip: Display minimum, maximum, and average FPS statistics.
helium.option.native_memory.tooltip: Use off-heap memory for large buffers. Reduces GC pressure but uses more system RAM.
helium.option.native_memory_pool_size.to: Maximum MB of off-heap memory to allocate. Higher = more cache, more RAM usage.
helium.option.render_pipelining.tooltip: Experimental async culling. May improve FPS on multi-core systems. Can cause visual glitches.
helium.option.simd_math.tooltip: Use Java Vector API for batch math operations. Requires JDK with incubator modules.
helium.option.async_light_updates.toolti: Process light updates on background threads. May cause brief lighting flicker.
helium.option.packet_batching.tooltip: Batch outgoing network packets to reduce syscall overhead. Off by default.
helium.option.temporal_reprojection.tool: Reuse rendered data from previous frames. Reduces render cost but may cause ghosting.
helium.option.nvidia_optimizations.toolt: Enable parallel shader compile and driver hints. Auto-detected, only active on NVIDIA GPUs.
helium.option.amd_optimizations.tooltip: 256-byte buffer alignment and pinned memory hints. Auto-detected, only active on AMD GPUs.
helium.option.intel_optimizations.toolti: Extra aggressive GL state caching for Intel iGPUs. Auto-detected, only active on Intel GPUs.
helium.option.adaptive_sync.tooltip: Detect G-Sync/FreeSync and adjust frame pacing to reduce input latency.
Experimental: Optimize frame delivery to reduce GPU overhead. Significantly boosts FPS on most hardware, may reduce smoothness on some systems.
helium.config.category.general.tooltip: Enable or disable the mod. Performance settings are in Sodium's video settings.
helium.config.enable.description: Turn Helium on or off. Requires a game restart to take effect.
helium.android.title: Helium
helium.android.warning_line1: Some features may not work perfectly on Android.
helium.android.warning_line2: The mod will still run, but stability is not guaranteed.
helium.android.gl_disabled: GL State Cache has been disabled automatically.
helium.android.still_works: All other features should work normally.
helium.option.fullbright.tooltip: Remove all darkness. Press G to toggle quickly. Purely visual, no gameplay advantage on servers.
helium.option.show_coordinates.tooltip: Display your X, Y, Z position in the overlay.
helium.option.show_biome.tooltip: Display the current biome name in the overlay.
helium.config.category.tools.tooltip: Export and import your Helium configuration.
helium.config.export.description: Save your current settings to helium-export.json in the config folder.
helium.config.import.description: Load settings from helium-export.json in the config folder. Overwrites current settings.
helium.config.category.developer.tooltip: Developer options for testing and debugging.
helium.config.dev_mode.description: Enable developer mode for enhanced performance metrics and testing features.
